name: Allison Of Astra: Margarita (S1 E5)
description:
When Allison first warps into Margarita's penthouse, the young woman doesn't take kindly to the invasion. But when Margarita is kidnapped, Allison may be the only one who can save her!

Contains a full Allison Of Astra adventure for your NES, plus the creative stamp program MESS MAKER!

Try before you buy: play the browser version here!
